title: Just give everyone a ban
body: title just give everyone a fucking ban so all the people can ban champs they don't like instead of only 60% of the time. There is like 130ish champions in this game 1 ban each, that seems pretty fair.

replies.body: Rito talked about it and said that they are planning for 5 bans per team next season.
I find that 10 bans will cause issues, especially if targeting a single role.

If all five bans target one role then that gives the other four roles free-reign to choose whatever broken bullshit champs they want. Only an idiot team would do something like ban only top lane bruisers, or something.

10 . Hexakill is the one with 6 each.
(lol can't do 0 beside a period for some reason)

loooooll. dont know how i manage that one.

But nevertheless. I'm a top lane juggernaut/lane bully player. 5+ bans focused solely on those types of champs can potentially screw me over quite well.

You should realize, though, that people aren't going to ban champs for only 1 lane. There are 5 "lanes" (priorities is a better word), 6 roles, and a shit ton of sub-roles; even if they somehow decide to max ban on one role, there's still a whole lot of champs for that role and a whole lot of champs that can fulfill other roles in your main's place in case you aren't proficient in those other champs for the role you want.
If you're having to worry about 2 extra bans ruining your game, I'd have to say you should be playing more champs and more playstyles. If you're having to worry about 2 extra bans for both your opponent's team and *your* team ruining your game, then there's a Report option at the end of the game for the ones ruining your game for you.
